website_summaries.verdict: Piece folds flat, so this storage piece is also easy to store away.
pros: Easy-access piece, since the lid swings open on either side so you don’t have to take everything off the top first
Despite the folding assembly, it’s still sturdy enough to sit on, with comfortable padding
Some bought multiples and stacked them together
cons: The lid has to be held up for access unless fully opened, so not suitable for small kids who could get fingers nipped

customer_reviews.title: Extra Thick Cushion Top
customer_reviews.text: This is your typical collapsible cardboard box covered in durable fabric. What gives it its 5 star rating is the top-extra thick cushioning & it’s heavy & sturdy. I use it to store king size blankets behind my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Mama

customer_reviews.title: this thing looks like an ugly patterned coffin
customer_reviews.text: not going to lie, this think legit looks like a coffin or alternative container in my living room floor. it's ugly as hell and makes me wish i had just not been cheap and spent the extra 10 or so dollars for the solid colored one. i repeat: it looks like a coffin. the patterns don't even align to be uniform. i'm so angry. on the bright side, it does store a heck of a lot of things and has eliminated a lot of the clutter in my corners. but another downside to it besides being coffin-like is that it's uncomfortable to rest the feet on as an ottoman. there isn't enough padding on the "tufted" top.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Norm

customer_reviews.title: It was extremely easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: In an attempt to not have toys strewn everywhere, I got this to use as toy storage. It was extremely easy to set up, less than a minute. I absolutely love it! Very easy for kids to open and shut, and extra seating if needed; also a great spot to put shoes on. As for toys strewn about, this doesn’t exactly fix that, because kids, but it sure is nice storage for pick up!
customer_reviews.author: 3LittleFish

customer_reviews.title: very pretty and large
customer_reviews.text: i love this ottoman so much. it is a great size, easy to put together and holds a crap ton of stuff. Right now I use it to put my laptop in as well as about ten blankets lol. Also a great height for actually putting your feet on it. Seems sturdy, although i have already broken one side by simply sitting on it. I guess it is only meant for feet?
customer_reviews.author: Casey Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty decent size but I'll probably need another one or ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed something affordable for my daughter's toys so I bought this because I didn't want something loud or character print for the living room. It's pretty decent size but I'll probably need another one or get rid of toys. Not sure how well it will hold up to a rough 4 year old but I didn't want to spend a lot of money on something that would eventually be torn up from kid use so if this lasts a year I'll be happy. This would be good for blankets/pillows/stuffed animals for sure just thinking with the heavier bulky toys it may not last very long but will find out. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Jells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great ottoman for our bedroom. Able to hold a king size quilt, queen size fleece blanket, throw blanket, 5 pairs of pillow cases, an extra bed skirt, and 2 sets of sheets. Very sturdy and good quality. My 65 lbs dog has slept on it ever since we got it. I love how you can lift only one side of the lid up, instead of removing it entirely, too access the contents inside. Very tempted to order another one, if not two.
customer_reviews.author: Amesterific

customer_reviews.title: shocked at the value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy. its like those fabric cubicle cubes except with more support. the fabric design and coloring are tastefully muted. the two dividers held up well. i filled mine with toys, none of which were too big. i wouldnt sit a 300 lb person on it but its perfect for the kids to sit on. a good foot rest. i shop a LOT and buy lots of pieces in the price range bc i have a lot of kids and refuse to buy forever furniture until theyve grown up. this is one of the highest quality pieces ive found. will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Luna Mireles

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Storage Solution!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoping it wouldn’t look too dwarfed at the foot of my Broyhill California king-sized bed. (The dimensions of this storage ottoman compared to other Ottomans had me nervous.) However, as you can see from the pictures, it does not. It matches our decor beautifully, the blue is a perfect blend of denim and navy, and it houses my snow and rain boots perfectly. I hope to buy this in other colors for additional rooms and am currently trying to talk my kids into needing ones for theirs! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Teachah Lady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, takes only seconds to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, takes only seconds to assemble, exactly as pictured. I can store a ton of stuff inside. I wanted this style so my dogs bouncy balls don't roll underneath. It is a bit too low, but I had measured before ordering, so I expected that. I use a thick pillow to prop my legs up when watching TV. No more clutter, and things I need are close at hand. The shipping was super speedy with Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne DKNY14048

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale, and I expected "meh" quality at best. I was pleasantly shocked when it arrived. At first I thought the base seemed flimsy, and I wasn't sure I was going to like it. But the top is heavy, and my toddler jumps on it with absolutely no problem. Storage capacity is good. They include dividers, but you don't have to put them in if you need to store something big. I actually want a ton of these for all over the house, that's how useful they are. Couldn't be happier with this purchase. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I had a Christmas brunch in my apartment for the family and at least 5 people commented on this bench. The next day my mom ordered one and my niece called to ask where I'd gotten it because she was going to be ordering one for her mom (my sister). It's easy to assemble, looks great, has plenty of storage space, and has seated 2 adults and one kid with no problem. My only minor issue, and it's small, is that I wish it came in more colors and designs.
customer_reviews.author: michele mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: This holds a good amount and hides the clutter
customer_reviews.text: Completely exceeded my expectations! This is much more durable than I had anticipated. My large dog (100+ lb) slept on it the first night I had it in my bedroom. My very rambunctious 5-yr-old then proceeded to climb/jump/be a rambunctious 5-yr-old on top of it. Even empty, it's withstanding the full abuse of our household with grace and style. This holds a good amount and hides the clutter. For the price, I'm incredibly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia N

customer_reviews.title: Not color fast
customer_reviews.text: Storage box is big and sturdy but there was cosmetic defects on the lid. There was brown discolorations that looked like dirt. When I tried to spot clean with water only the blue color rubbed off making a big blue blob in that area. So I would not say this is a quality item. However it serves its storage purpose in my son's room. We just can't get it dirty or clean it. My son is 4... Wish us luck..
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Attractive. Functional.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love this! Versatile and sturdy! Makes a great coffee table with lots of storage and doubles as spare seating. Holds up 2 full grown adults no problem. Very cute and great fabric. I got the blue. I love that it serves as a coffee table while only taking up 1/2 the width of a standard coffee table. Also this is a great option for clumsy new walkers. No sharp corners.
customer_reviews.author: TAP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This 45” ottoman looks great in front of my king bed and can hold a decent amount of bath towels and sheets. The cushion is comfy, and it comes with removable Velcro dividers. I like that I can open one side without lifting the entire lid up. Setup takes almost no time at all. My only gripe is the strong factory smell. Let it air out for a few days then use baking soda to absorb some of the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Rolls

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Storage Bench - Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my Ottoman. It is a Fantastic Storage, The Combination of Colors is Beautiful. It is very helpful to Store some things. It came here right on time. Very well protected. Fantastic Piece. Thanks to the seller and AMAZON. Sincerely, Guadalupe F Kennedy
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe F. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Can't Say Enough
customer_reviews.text: This came today and was more than I expected. I really wasn't sure it would hold all my grand daughter's toys - I needed something in my living room that made a mess of toys look neat once put away. It is very deep and that helped immensely, and it is a blue that matches my couch and chair. I got the 30' and it fits great. The 45' would have been too long. Love it! (oh, it did have a strong "new" smell, I just put a dryer sheet under the fiberboard bottom and it is fine)
customer_reviews.author: L. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: I was a little concerned how sturdy this would be since it comes folded up
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned how sturdy this would be since it comes folded up, but it is great. I can sit on it and store items inside and the lids that lift on either side make it so easy to access those items stored in it.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Decorative and great storage for multiple purposes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for our playroom to hide all our dress-up items. It is perfect!!! Makes the to look neater and adds a decorative piece while hiding a kid items! Because I like them so much I purchased two more for my son's room to store all his stuffed animals in. Love this item. Will buy more for other room. It is excellent for adding see pattern and storage all at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: melinda davis

customer_reviews.title: Great looking storage!
customer_reviews.text: Great storage solution.I have an at home crochet business that I use this to store yarn that I work with all the time. It is so easy to get in and out of. I bought a second one for my bedroom for pillow and blanket storage. Extremely nice looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Akey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews about this product because I was skeptical of the price. I was very impressed with the sturdiness! My husband and I both sat on it and it was solid! I love the print as well. My only complaint is that it came with a terrible smell. I don't know how else to describe it other than the "chew can" beef jerky. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle McLane

customer_reviews.title: The best storage bench ever!
customer_reviews.text: It is great looking, roomy and overall fabulous. This is the best storage bench I ever had. Ordered one more but unfortunately it was the last one, and the price really "jumped" the way Amazon has been doing lately. What a shame. I hope that it finally gets shipped in a couple pf months, as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia St. Jules

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy toy chest!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a toy chest for my daughters room and it works perfectly. It is the perfect size for my three year old to utilize without any issues. It is very durable and my daughter and I can sit on it together and it feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CLB

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I got this to store my daughters toys (she’s 1). It was easy to set up and holds a lot. I like that there are 3 separate compartments so it’s somewhat tidy, a lot better than the toys scattered around our living room. Seems sturdy so far. I sat on it (135 lbs) and it held me. I’d maybe sway my husband from sitting on it but it will make a great foot stool for him :)
customer_reviews.author: Megs44146

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy storage solution/seat.
customer_reviews.text: Our toy room is upstairs, but toys always migrated downstairs. I had a couple bins near the stairs to catch the strays, but it’s also our shoe area. I needed a storage bench, but didn’t want something I was going to have to assemble. This was a perfect solution. I wish it was about 8 inches longer, but it works and it’s cute. It’s sturdy, too. I’m about 180 lbs and it easily held me. I want to buy more for my toy room and bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, incredibly easy to assemble, and makes for a perfect raised dog bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a sort of dog bed for my small dogs (French Bulldog and Cavalier King Charles Spaniel) to lay on while I work in my office. It's a perfect height for them to jump onto, and more than sturdy enough to hold them on top. It can even withstand my weight (190lbs) without wanting to wobble or collapse. The pillow on top isn't incredibly soft, but soft enough for my dogs to happily sleep upon. At $25, this was an ABSOLUTE steal. I'd have paid $50 for it, honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kilinski

customer_reviews.title: Great for College Students!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew, everyone poo-pooed the idea except my nephew. He loved it and by the time my sister packed it up and took it too school, she hated it. At the dorm room, it came in handy and he loved it even more. I know she did but...as all sisters go, she never said thank you or it was great idea. She just said it came in handy and he found so many uses for it. Go figures, guess some Aunties are not so crazy after all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot heavier and sturdier than I expected. I had bought a similar item in the past that was more expensive and was flimsy. I am using this as a toy bin for my daughter’s bedroom. This one was more substantial and didn’t buckle even when filled to capacity with toys. Assembly was very easy. Actually there was virtually no assembly. I took it out do the box and put the dividers in and that was it. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: So much storage and it's HEAVY duty
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday to store 2 Queen blankets, 3 Twin blankets and all are thick. It's extremely HEAVY duty. It's also the Perfect height for a couch and it's at a perfect length as well. Highly recommend this it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly G.

customer_reviews.title: The capacity can hold alot of toys
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I purchased it for a place to hide toys in my livingroom and it is perfect. My 1 year can access it (we open the lid) easily. Also the lid opens halfway so you can have something on the lid like accent pillows or whatever. Kinda pricey but definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Nom

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to build, but top is heavy and could smash tiny fingers.
customer_reviews.text: This piece is great. Only 4-stores though because I worry about the way the lid is. I use this as a toy box for my 9 month old and when he digs in it, it’s usually fine with the lid all the way off or folded on one side. The issue is, if you’re using it as a toy box, it’s really easy to open and kind of drops shut in a heavy way. It’s really easy for the heavy top to come smashing down on tiny fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Frey

customer_reviews.title: Great box and handy a plus for any small homes needing extra storage
customer_reviews.text: I love this box. It's so handy for storing clothes and other things in and is decorative. It's sturdy and looks very nice not like a cheap box.
customer_reviews.author: Life Is Good

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. I got 2; my room is all tidied up and not much clutter. When my roommate saw mine, she wanted it also and when we came back to buy again, the price has gone up from the $20 to $33.99. I will be purchasing only 1 more. I would have given it 5 stars if it had a rope or floppy handles to lift it when packed. It had to be lifted from the bottom or seek another pair of hands moving it.
customer_reviews.author: SylGee123

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 6 of these. They complement my library perfectly and even improve the acoustics. (Did not expect that.) I'm getting tons of compliments on them. The price of the ottomans was more than reasonable, but the shipping cost was quite high. The items arrived very quickly after I ordered them. Very speedy delivery. Thank you, Otto and Ben
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: We just downsized to a smaller house that is lacking in storage space, so I needed some storage options that would look good in the back of a closet...or out in a bonus room. This is a sturdy unit (surprisingly so - much more than I expected) and it holds a bunch of my winter shoes/boots. A good purchase overall!
customer_reviews.author: kstay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! This little box holds all my baby toys plus is sturdy enough for someone to sit on! I had doubts when I saw its folds but once it’s all together no one would ever know it was that simple! Love it, I will be ordering longer ones for the bedrooms to hold extra winter clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Alysa

customer_reviews.title: Moroccan grey is not grey at all
customer_reviews.text: This review is on the color, I didn't get to use the Ottoman. The "Moroccan Grey" is a brownish color with cream accents. First one I got I returned because I thought I received the brown in error but when the second one arrived I sent it back as well. Disappointed that the color is so wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Rbann

customer_reviews.title: I have not had this product that long and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this product that long and it is already destroyed. It was in my girls bedroom and they put toys inside. It did not take long for the top of the ottoman to rip. I was not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Denna Witt

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gamble of a buy but that gamble paid off! This is a nice sized sturdy box that I am using beside my bed to 1. help my small dogs jump on and off my bed, and 2. free up some closet storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright as picture
customer_reviews.text: While this is very pretty and definitely sturdy, I am disappointed in the colors. They are very dull in person. On the picture it shows almost shiny and bright colors, but that wasn't the case when I opened it up. I bought curtains to match it fairly close based on putting the curtain picture next to the ottoman picture, and while the curtains are nice and cheery, the ottoman is just boring and I may have to replace it with something else now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Sturdy, Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, picture is accurate. It holds a surprising amount of stuff (I can hide the paw patroller!!!) It is sturdy enough to sit on, and was easy to put together too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great storage box! Good size and pretty decent quality, for the price. The box comes flat and is super easy to assemble - you just unfold the sides and put the bottom piece in. The top piece is very nice and sturdy. I cannot keep my 3 year old from climbing on top, and so far, he has not collapsed it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMama

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practical
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect bench, toy box, ottoman, storage option for everyone! I just bought two more, one for me and one for my sister. I’m using one as a toy box in the living room and one in the bathroom for linen storage and it’s just perfect! Bought one as a Christmas present! It comes in great colors, has divided or undivided storage, is easy to move and assemble—took literally 60 seconds—and is super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Clowers

customer_reviews.title: Love them all ♥️
customer_reviews.text: Otto&Ben storage chests never disappoint you 😊. Sturdy construction so sitting on them a plus and the ones with the cover divided in half make accessibility to contents a breeze 👍🏻!!️
customer_reviews.author: miamiladybug

customer_reviews.title: Great storage box
customer_reviews.text: The construction is great. It looks like it does in the picture, and it could pass for a bench as well because of the construction and the fact that the seat is padded. I'm very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mc Culley

customer_reviews.title: STRONG! STURDY!
customer_reviews.text: My 160lbs and my Boyfriends 220lbs can both sit on this to put our shoes on without fear of it buckling or breaking.
customer_reviews.author: J Bork

customer_reviews.title: Surprising good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Surprising good quality for the price. I use mine at the foot of the bed as storage and a step up for my 17lb dog. Very steady, it doesn't move when she jumps on it.
customer_reviews.author: Magpookie

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well made
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this as a foot stool/toy storage device in my living room and it is great. Attractive and very sturdy. Also, assembly only required popping it open!
customer_reviews.author: Katie & Danny Young

customer_reviews.title: Great as a toy chest with style
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice piece and has worked great as a toy chest for my living room. The 3 dividers help organize all the toys. The divided top makes it easy for my 3 year old daughter to open and close. It seems sturdy enough as my kids and I have sat on it, about 200 lbs together.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL OTTOMAN
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this ottoman!!! It's very stylish and serves it's purpose as a toy box and barricade well! It's one of the longest ones I found online. Scotchguard it, and it will last a lot longer!!!! As far as weight holding- I'm 150lbs, and it holds Me fine. It does seem unsteady with the cardboard sides.
customer_reviews.author: K.Mar

customer_reviews.title: If you like it, get it. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this one. I got the 45" floral design. Great color and way more study than I thought. We have less closet space in our new townhome, so this is perfect for off season clothes or blankets. Will def purchase this seller/brand again. Well-worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: PhillyDoza

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Delivered and received item fast. Exactly as expected. The purpose was toy storage for my infant and foot rest for the adults . Now my daughter is a toddler...she climbs up on this regularly to sit on it. It has held up. The cushion seat is surprisingly comfy, the rest is a standard storage box. It holds all her toys and looks decent in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliee

customer_reviews.title: Pet storage
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Color looks great. Actually using it to store our Pet toys and extra stuff. He also sits on it and looks out the window. Loves it because he's not a big dog and can't really reach the window to well.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I’ve ever made! We use it for toddler toys. It looks cute in our living room and super useful. It’s durable enough to sit on (if you’re light weight of course).
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect to put my summer clothes away in. It does come with 2 dividers which I didn't use just so that I could have more space to fit everything. I will end up buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: NYmomma

customer_reviews.title: Love this box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at the end of my bed for storage. The box is sturdy and the material is very good quality. It holds a ton and I love the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: JSL

customer_reviews.title: Small w no bottom support
customer_reviews.text: Sent back bc literally there's no bottom to this. No feet, no wood just a piece of thin material. Not made well n much smaller then expected.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Spacious organizer compartment, sturdy frame, great price. The grey is a lovely neutral to warmish that complements hardwood and a variety of colors in my living room. LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: TOY CHEST
customer_reviews.text: Brought it for my grand kids toy - most kids toy chests are pretty small so they don't hold many toys but this one does. I just wish that it came in children's fun designs/colors.
customer_reviews.author: RIRED2

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well made
customer_reviews.text: I got it for the deal, even tho It had ‘70s flowers! I was pleasently surprised to feel the weight of the box, its a better option to all those flimsy foldable storage ottomans.
customer_reviews.author: Cici Sparkman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful with exception of lid
customer_reviews.text: This is such a gorgeous piece and it fits so much ! The only thing Is that lid takes a minute to place on top perfectly aligned which can be annoying if you constantly open and close it as I do to retórica my children’s toys and then put them away at the end Of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Darth

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A lot more sturdy than I thought it would be. Fits great in the living room and has a lot of room for all kinds of things AKA toys!
customer_reviews.author: Ana G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this ottoman for our cats to sit on to watch birds and squirrels at the bird feeder. They love it and so do I. The color matches the decor in our home which has a lot of orange and aqua. The ottoman is sturdier than I expected and great for extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for price! Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to throw my shoes in when people come in the front door so it’s perfect for that. But I wouldn’t suggest anyone over 130lbs to sit on it! Took 30 seconds to put together and great fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Boomershine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a low price!
customer_reviews.text: VERY easy to put together. Sturdy enough to sit on with a little padding on the top. Seems like it will hold together well. Plan to use it in my daughter's nursery for extra storage and additional seating. Looks really nice too. Very impressed with the quality for such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the 1st one I bought so much that I bought 2 more! They were great as steps for my dogs to jump on the bed. They are study and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Paula C

customer_reviews.title: Quality material and beautiful. I use it to store toys and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality material and beautiful. I use it to store toys and my two year old has an easy time opening and closing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is a great value for the price. I store my bed linens in it, and it is so great!
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Good looking product. Only draw back is that it isn't sturdy enough to sit on. But perfect for toys or other items in need of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly very sturdy!! Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised how sturdy this bench was.... for the low price. I’m using it in my classroom this, it aids as additional storage as well. I’m thinking about purchasing another One soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kmsh.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the end of the bed
customer_reviews.text: Actually 2 would be perfect because I have a king bed, and this only is about half the width, but it holds my blankets, and my old dog uses it as a step to get up on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Well constructed and what not. Would get 5 stars but occasionally the sides bow out and you have to work to get the lid down but for the price you're not going to get perfection.
customer_reviews.author: DEREK

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I store my child's toys in it, in the living room. It's the perfect size and it looks nice. I didn't think it would be as sturdy as it is, but it held a 150+ lb person, no problem! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby’s stuff, or more !
customer_reviews.text: Those are perfect ! I got some black ones from an other brand, while they are good too, they don’t open like that, and I found it really convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Thierry Brouard

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect and as described
customer_reviews.text: Using it as a toy box for my grandkids and it is beautiful and sturdy and easy to assemble....I will order another.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: This looks great, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This looks great, easy to assemble. No defects/blemishes, arrived in good condition. I use it as an (attractive) storage box in the laundry. I do not intend to place any heavy things on top, so I do not know if/how it would tolerate that.
customer_reviews.author: Deliutz

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Don't move it around too much, or sit on it a lot, it is a bit flimsy. But I am able to store a good bit of linens in mine, so I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, pretty and very well made. I couldn’t believe how nice it is! The cushion is comfortable and it hold SO MANY TOYS! We got our living room back.
customer_reviews.author: ABCocuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage box
customer_reviews.text: Works well for resting my feet when I am seating on the couch, but not sturdy enough for sitting on it. Has a good amount of storage space, looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Arka Santra

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this box. It's cuter in real life and very sturdy. I bought a second one in a larger size after testing out this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to assemble. It's pretty sturdy and has plenty of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Soua V.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have two. Ordered one for the LR but loved it so much I use it in my master bdrm. When redoing a child’s room, bought a second for misc you storage! Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: I really thought it would be an Okay item but ...
customer_reviews.text: I really thought it would be an Okay item but it was sturdier than i thought it was going to bee once put together! The lid is think and the 30" fit 3 blankets and a pillow with more room to put maybe another blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Tate

customer_reviews.title: good design, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Like it, this is a good storage ottoman. I like the design where we don't need to open the entire top to get something out, just need to open one side to retrieve something out.
customer_reviews.author: Aachpach

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture and is sturdy like I need it to be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: While not very sturdy, these are beautiful and work for what I need. I have two 30” at the foot of my bed to store sheets and throw pillows.
customer_reviews.author: PBM

customer_reviews.title: Great Ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: This Ottoman was perfect for my living room. It goes great with my color scheme and I can easily store blankets, books, etc. I own 7 in different sizes and colors. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Pcherubs

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I put this in the kids' room to store some toys and use as a seat. It has done a good job of holding up and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kajean Secord-Bennett

customer_reviews.title: the cats like it too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a toy chest in our living room and it exceeded my expectations. It fits plenty and it holds my husband should he need a seat! the cats like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My cats say “Thank you, now we can look outside”.
customer_reviews.text: Our two full grown cats love sitting/laying here to look outside. It’s a great product for the price, and extra storage is always handy to have.
customer_reviews.author: Shellzbellz

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic storage ottoman. Fits 6 large blankets. I placed it behind the couch for when blankets and extra pillow are not in use, and my cats use it to nap on. Stylish design.
customer_reviews.author: Meg77

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous ordering this because I was unsure of how sturdy it would be in my daughter's nursery. However, I was pleasantly surprised that this was extremely sturdy, well made, and adorable. I love the top that opens on both sides. Perfect as a fashionable toy box in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the interior
customer_reviews.text: The bench is as described, holds well, but don’t sit on it)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Graves

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I can sit on it and fit in it. This thing is great
customer_reviews.author: Katie & Danny Young

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup. Quality materials. Sturdy. Can hold an adult of 200lbs sitting on it. Lots of room for a comforter, 6 towels and 3 blankets. Exactly what I was looking for. Colors are vibrant and true to pictures. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Simple but well engineered product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble (like 2 minutes). Sturdy and can handle weight of an adult. Spacious inside. I like that you can open only a half and don't need to take the whole top off. Overall pretty looking and good quality. Perfect fit for my hallway.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Chupilko

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage. Quick setup!
customer_reviews.text: Great little storage box. Set up in less than one minute. 3 yo Granddaughter loves lying on it and coloring. Might get another to create a sectional seating area. I do wish it came in more colors but overall pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Freeze

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! It’s easy to assemble, it fit A LOT of toys inside & it looks adorable next to my daughters bed. She’s able to sit on it or put toys on top of it. Worth the money! Color is just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: A lot smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Not stain resistant. A lot smaller than I would have liked. If you need storage this isn't the storage bin for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks good & sturdy. Use it for children's toys. They have not been gentle with ottoman & it still holds up! The lid/top requires a little effort to close. I'd buy it again... I purchased two already.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy4Life

product_meta.title: Otto & Ben Folding Toy Box Chest with SMART LIFT Top, Mid Century Upholstered Ottomans Bench Foot Rest, Retro Floral
product_meta.description:
Color:Retro Floral| Size:30 inchOtto and Ben 30in SMART LIFT TOP Ottoman Storage Bench
This mid-century modern, multi-purpose ottoman bench with hidden storage is the perfect accent furniture to delight your home that needs storage as well as decor needs! Padded with premium comfort foam, the cushion top makes it super comfortable for sitting while premium linen fabric adds lush and modern look and feel to your interior.

Features:

Comfort Foam Padded Top: adds extra seating comfort
Quick and Easy Folding: folds in flat and unfolds into a storage form within seconds 
Smart Lift Top: lid swings open on either side so you don’t have to clear the top as it opens. 
Designs Available: [Moroccan Pattern] Gray, Brown [Octagonal Pattern] Blue, Orange [Floral] Cream 
Upholstery Material: Premium Linen 
Construction Material: Medium-Density Fiber Board (MDF)
Product Size (inches): 
ASEEMBLED: 30L x 15W x 15H
INNER STORAGE: 28.5L x 13.5W x 13H


THE PERFECT ACCENT BENCH 
Charm any space/feature of the house including ENTRYWAY / HALLWAY / LIVING ROOM / BEDROOM / WINDOW LEDGE / VANITY TABLE 

PERFECT FOR SPACE SAVING!
Bedroom, living room, work space, closet, kids play room, you name it!
The perfect solution for your organization needs! All those loose items lying around like blankets, cushions, clothes, remotes, books or little toys now have a place to be neatly stored

BEDROOM STORAGE BENCH – The SMART LIFT TOP is an absolute charmer!
Featuring classic Tuft cushion top that swings open on either side, this storage is the perfect footboard partner to store books, magazines, blankets, extra pillows and other treasures. 

CARE INSTRUCTIONS
Spot clean, air dry. DO NOT use bleach.
feature_bullets: Cushion foam padding: superior seating comfort
Smart lift Top: lid that swings open on either side, so you don’t have to clear the Top every time you open it
Easy Set up & fold away: designed to fold into a flat Board and can be stored Inside the lid. Super easy setup: simply unfold, position base piece and cover.
Perfect for space Saving needs: spacious hidden storage space for loose odds and ends
Sturdy Construction: constructed with Medium-density fiberboard for stability
